CMTest.php

00001 <?php
00002 
00012 class CMTest {
00013  
00019  public $name = "";
00020  
00024  public $script = false;
00025  
00029  public $units = array();
00030  
00034  public static $PHP = "php";
00035  
00039  public $pass = 0;
00040  
00044  public $fail = 0;
00045  
00049  public $skip = 0;
00050  
00057  public function CMTest($name, $script) {
00058   $this->name = $name;
00059   $this->script = $script;
00060  }
00061  
00065  public function run() {
00066   echo $this->name;
00067   
00068   // get the test units
00069   $cmd = CMTest::$PHP . ' ' . $this->script . ' getTestUnits';
00070   $us = explode(';', `$cmd`);
00071   foreach($us as $u)
00072    $this->units[substr($u, 0, strpos($u, '='))] = substr($u, strpos($u, '=') + 1);
00073   
00074   // run init(), this can tell us to skip the test
00075   $cmd = CMTest::$PHP . ' ' . $this->script . ' init';
00076   $result = `$cmd`;
00077   if($result == "SKIP") {
00078    echo " (SKIPPED)";
00079    return true;
00080   }
00081   echo "\n";
00082    
00083   // run the units
00084   $i = 1;
00085   foreach($this->units as $k => $v) {
00086    $cmd = CMTest::$PHP . ' ' . $this->script . ' ' . $k;
00087    $result = `$cmd`;
00088    echo "  ($i/", count($this->units), ") $result: $v\n";
00089    if($result == "PASS")
00090     ++$this->pass;
00091    else if($result == "SKIP")
00092     ++$this->skip;
00093    else ++$this->fail;
00094    ++$i;
00095   }
00096   
00097   // run finish()
00098   $cmd = CMTest::$PHP . ' ' . $this->script . ' finish';
00099   $result = `$cmd`;
00100   
00101   // print stats
00102   echo "Done: $this->pass passed, $this->skip skipped, $this->fail failed\n\n";
00103  }
00104  
00105 }
00106 
00107 ?>
